LanguageData.PTR01sl.degreeDatas.0.label: <color=#CDCDCD>势利</color>
LanguageData.PTR01sl.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]争名逐利。[PAWN_pronoun]总在追求更高的荣誉头衔，缺少头衔会不开心。
LanguageData.PTR02qg.degreeDatas.0.label: <color=#CDCDCD>清高</color>
LanguageData.PTR02qg.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]淡泊名利。[PAWN_pronoun]不喜欢荣誉头衔，拥有头衔会不开心。
